vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ὑπερῷον,
Epic dialect and Ionic dialect ὑπερ-ώϊον, τό, the upper part of the house, where the women resided, παρθένος αἰδοίη ὑπερώϊον εἰσαναβᾶσα [Refs 8th c.BC+]; ὑπερωϊόθεν φρεσὶ σύνθετο θέσπιν ἀοιδὴν.. Πηνελόπεια from her chamber she heard it, [Refs]upper chamber or story, [NT+2nd c.AD+]
__2 attic, garret, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; of a spare room, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: - a higher part of the house, i.e. apartment in the third story
vocabInfos.mediumDef: - a higher part of the house, i.e. apartment in the third story
vocabInfos._es_Definition: aposento alto, cuarto del segundo piso
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 屋子的最上層, 樓上的房間
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 屋子的最上层, 楼上的房间
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: phòng trên lầu; một phòng cao; một căn phòng ở phần trên của một ngôi nhà
